title: Runner bean and prawn salad with fresh mint vinaigrette
description: This summery salad is perfect for alfresco dining, just add some rocket or Little Gem lettuce to bulk it out.
ingredients: 350-450g/12oz-1lb runner beans, stringed and finely shredded at an angle
2 tsp sesame seeds, toasted in a dry frying pan
extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil for drizzling (optional)
